<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Create a disassembler for the TripleName.  Symbolic disassembly is supported</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; by passing a block of information in the DisInfo parameter and specifying the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; TagType and callback functions as described above.  These can all be passed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; as NULL.  If successful, this returns a disassembler context.  If not, it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; returns NULL. This function is equivalent to calling</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; LLVMCreateDisasmCPUFeatures() with an empty CPU name and feature set.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Dispose of a disassembler context.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcdisassembler/#ga15b630b4a386bee86ad5a10ff7592af0">LLVMDisasmDispose</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcdisassembler/#gae903996143e88ff186c738f81122094e">LLVMDisasmContextRef</a> DC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Disassemble a single instruction using the disassembler context specified in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; the parameter DC.  The bytes of the instruction are specified in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; parameter Bytes, and contains at least BytesSize number of bytes.  The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; instruction is at the address specified by the PC parameter.  If a valid</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; instruction can be disassembled, its string is returned indirectly in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; OutString whose size is specified in the parameter OutStringSize.  This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; function returns the number of bytes in the instruction or zero if there was</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; no valid instruction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcdisassembler/#ga4ab4dad1fdcb9e651fa60f6059ab09b4">LLVMDisasmInstruction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcdisassembler/#gae903996143e88ff186c738f81122094e">LLVMDisasmContextRef</a> DC, uint8&#95;t &#42;Bytes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">                             uint64&#95;t BytesSize, uint64&#95;t PC,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;OutString, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OutStringSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; @&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
